Build-Depends: haskell-devscripts (>= 0.13), dh-sequence-haskell, debhelper-compat (= 13), ghc (>= 9.4), ghc-prof, libghc-x11-dev (>= 1.10), libghc-x11-dev (<< 1.11), libghc-x11-prof, libghc-data-default-class-dev, libghc-data-default-class-prof, libghc-setlocale-dev, libghc-setlocale-prof, libx11-dev, libxinerama-dev, pandoc-data
